content: Hi all. We have sucessfully integrated inferno tests into our CICD pipeline. We had to modify the inferno docker to incorporate chromedriver and selenium to run the Smart on FHIR sequences. We have it fully working. We are willing to contribute this code back to the OS project if it is of interest.

Hi @Richard Braman -- we'd love to take a look and merge it in if it makes sense. We had built in this kind of functionality early on in the project, but haven't maintained it because we've had a lot on our plate. But if you have done the work of getting that into shape, and upgraded the docker image to include the necessary libraries, I think others would find it useful.
Hi @Richard Braman I'm working on integration Inferno to CICD, can you tell about your solution and share Dokerfiles?
Hi @Richard Braman , I am planning to hook up inferno with CI/CD. Could you please help me with some pointers?
